## AbsNode class

Computes the absolute value

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class AbsNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns \|x\| (magnitude without sign). Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
